actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to defer the inclusion in income with respect to transfers of stock in a corporation pursuant to certain employee stock options.

summary.text: Employee Stock Ownership Assistance Act - Title I: Sets forth the short-title of this Act and specifies that all amendments made by this Act shall be considered as amendments to the Internal Revenue Code. Title II: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deferral in the case of a transfer to an individual of stock in a corporation pursuant to an employee stock option, if both the corporation and the individual elect. Allows such a deferral until such time as a disposition of such stock occurs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to defer the inclusion in income with respect to transfers of stock in a corporation pursuant to certain employee stock options.
